With a rapidly changing climate, the need to plan together to improve the resilience of our communities is more important than ever.  
Closing Friday, 21 January - have your say on plans for homes and businesses to be resilient to flooding: https://t.co/LkJ3xrogp2

Saltmarshes are a nature-based solution to the climate crisis as they store carbon for centuries. 

On average saltmarshes store 2 tonnes of carbon per year and lock it into the sediment. 

They also protect coastal communities from sea level rise and storm surges.
